name: Better Than Baileys Hot Chocolate
description: The ultimate spiked hot chocolate, flavored with espresso, Amaretto, and Irish whiskey.
recipeIngredient: 1 teaspoon espresso powder (or 1/2 cup brewed espresso)

recipeInstructions.text: In medium saucepan, stir cocoa with sugar and salt. Stir in milk, milk chocolate, and bittersweet chocolate. Heat over medium heat until, stirring constantly, until chocolate is melted and mixture is hot. Gently whisk to completely homogenize mixture.
Add vanilla, espresso, Amaretto, and whiskey and stir to combine. Pour into glasses and serve with marshmallows.
